subject: Auctions
lead_paragraph: More than 200 items from the mansion once owned by the Giants’ Michael Strahan and his wife will be auctioned Sept. 14 at the Morristown, N.J., Armory. Strahan and his wife, Jean, went through a bitter public divorce that included allegations of physical abuse. Jean Strahan said in May that she was putting the mansion, valued at $3.6 million in 2006, on the market.
